org.hibernate.validator.internal.engine

类 ValidatorImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hibernate.validator.internal.engine.ValidatorImpl
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    javax.validation.executable.ExecutableValidator, javax.validation.Validator

    public class ValidatorImpl
extends Object
implements javax.validation.Validator, javax.validation.executable.ExecutableValidator
    The main Bean Validation class. This is the core processing class of Hibernate Validator.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      ValidatorImpl(javax.validation.ConstraintValidatorFactory constraintValidatorFactory, BeanMetaDataManager beanMetaDataManager, ValueExtractorManager valueExtractorManager, ConstraintValidatorManager constraintValidatorManager, ValidationOrderGenerator validationOrderGenerator, org.hibernate.validator.internal.engine.ValidatorFactoryImpl.ValidatorFactoryScopedContext validatorFactoryScopedContext)

      Validates all constraints placed on the parameters of the given constructor.

      Validates all return value constraints of the given constructor.

      Validates all constraints placed on the property of object named propertyName.

      Validates all return value constraints of the given method.

      Validates all constraints placed on the property named propertyName of the class beanType would the property value be value.

    • 方法详细资料

      • validate

        public final <T> Set<javax.validation.ConstraintViolation<T>> validate(T object,
                                                                       Class<?>... groups)
        从接口复制的说明: javax.validation.Validator
        Validates all constraints on object.
        指定者:
        validate 在接口中 javax.validation.Validator
        类型参数:
        T - the type of the object to validate
        参数:
        object - object to validate
        groups - the group or list of groups targeted for validation (defaults to Default)
        返回:
        constraint violations or an empty set if none

      • validateProperty

        public final <T> Set<javax.validation.ConstraintViolation<T>> validateProperty(T object,
                                                                               String propertyName,
                                                                               Class<?>... groups)
        从接口复制的说明: javax.validation.Validator
        Validates all constraints placed on the property of object named propertyName.
        指定者:
        validateProperty 在接口中 javax.validation.Validator
        类型参数:
        T - the type of the object to validate
        参数:
        object - object to validate
        propertyName - property to validate (i.e. field and getter constraints)
        groups - the group or list of groups targeted for validation (defaults to Default)
        返回:
        constraint violations or an empty set if none

      • validateValue

        public final <T> Set<javax.validation.ConstraintViolation<T>> validateValue(Class<T> beanType,
                                                                            String propertyName,
                                                                            Object value,
                                                                            Class<?>... groups)
        从接口复制的说明: javax.validation.Validator
        Validates all constraints placed on the property named propertyName of the class beanType would the property value be value.

        ConstraintViolation objects return null for ConstraintViolation.getRootBean() and ConstraintViolation.getLeafBean().

        指定者:
        validateValue 在接口中 javax.validation.Validator
        类型参数:
        T - the type of the object to validate
        参数:
        beanType - the bean type
        propertyName - property to validate
        value - property value to validate
        groups - the group or list of groups targeted for validation (defaults to Default).
        返回:
        constraint violations or an empty set if none

      • validateParameters

        public <T> Set<javax.validation.ConstraintViolation<T>> validateParameters(T object,
                                                                           Method method,
                                                                           Object[] parameterValues,
                                                                           Class<?>... groups)
        从接口复制的说明: javax.validation.executable.ExecutableValidator
        Validates all constraints placed on the parameters of the given method.
        指定者:
        validateParameters 在接口中 javax.validation.executable.ExecutableValidator
        类型参数:
        T - the type hosting the method to validate
        参数:
        object - the object on which the method to validate is invoked
        method - the method for which the parameter constraints is validated
        parameterValues - the values provided by the caller for the given method's parameters
        groups - the group or list of groups targeted for validation (defaults to Default)
        返回:
        a set with the constraint violations caused by this validation; will be empty if no error occurs, but never null

      • validateConstructorParameters

        public <T> Set<javax.validation.ConstraintViolation<T>> validateConstructorParameters(Constructor<? extends T> constructor,
                                                                                      Object[] parameterValues,
                                                                                      Class<?>... groups)
        从接口复制的说明: javax.validation.executable.ExecutableValidator
        Validates all constraints placed on the parameters of the given constructor.
        指定者:
        validateConstructorParameters 在接口中 javax.validation.executable.ExecutableValidator
        类型参数:
        T - the type hosting the constructor to validate
        参数:
        constructor - the constructor for which the parameter constraints is validated
        parameterValues - the values provided by the caller for the given constructor's parameters
        groups - the group or list of groups targeted for validation (defaults to Default)
        返回:
        a set with the constraint violations caused by this validation; Will be empty if no error occurs, but never null

      • validateConstructorReturnValue

        public <T> Set<javax.validation.ConstraintViolation<T>> validateConstructorReturnValue(Constructor<? extends T> constructor,
                                                                                       T createdObject,
                                                                                       Class<?>... groups)
        从接口复制的说明: javax.validation.executable.ExecutableValidator
        Validates all return value constraints of the given constructor.
        指定者:
        validateConstructorReturnValue 在接口中 javax.validation.executable.ExecutableValidator
        类型参数:
        T - the type hosting the constructor to validate
        参数:
        constructor - the constructor for which the return value constraints is validated
        createdObject - the object instantiated by the given method
        groups - the group or list of groups targeted for validation (defaults to Default)
        返回:
        a set with the constraint violations caused by this validation; will be empty, if no error occurs, but never null

      • validateReturnValue

        public <T> Set<javax.validation.ConstraintViolation<T>> validateReturnValue(T object,
                                                                            Method method,
                                                                            Object returnValue,
                                                                            Class<?>... groups)
        从接口复制的说明: javax.validation.executable.ExecutableValidator
        Validates all return value constraints of the given method.
        指定者:
        validateReturnValue 在接口中 javax.validation.executable.ExecutableValidator
        类型参数:
        T - the type hosting the method to validate
        参数:
        object - the object on which the method to validate is invoked
        method - the method for which the return value constraints is validated
        returnValue - the value returned by the given method
        groups - the group or list of groups targeted for validation (defaults to Default)
        返回:
        a set with the constraint violations caused by this validation; will be empty if no error occurs, but never null

      • getConstraintsForClass

        public final javax.validation.metadata.BeanDescriptor getConstraintsForClass(Class<?> clazz)
        从接口复制的说明: javax.validation.Validator
        Returns the descriptor object describing bean constraints.

        The returned object (and associated objects including ConstraintDescriptors) are immutable.

        指定者:
        getConstraintsForClass 在接口中 javax.validation.Validator
        参数:
        clazz - class or interface type evaluated
        返回:
        the bean descriptor for the specified class

      • unwrap

        public final <T> T unwrap(Class<T> type)
        从接口复制的说明: javax.validation.Validator
        Returns an instance of the specified type allowing access to provider-specific APIs.

        If the Bean Validation provider implementation does not support the specified class, ValidationException is thrown.

        指定者:
        unwrap 在接口中 javax.validation.Validator
        类型参数:
        T - the type of the object to be returned
        参数:
        type - the class of the object to be returned
        返回:
        an instance of the specified class

        从接口复制的说明: javax.validation.Validator
        Returns the contract for validating parameters and return values of methods and constructors.
        指定者:
        forExecutables 在接口中 javax.validation.Validator
        返回:
        contract for method and constructor validation
